FEATURED>>
Pivotal and VMware expand Strategic Partnership
Pivotal CF <http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=F-0G9_Pwi1U&feature=player_embedded>, a commercially supported hybrid Platform as a Service (PaaS) based on the Cloud Foundry platform. Pivotal CF will be made available on VMware vSphere® and vCloud® Hybrid Service™ later this year. Read more <http://www.gopivotal.com/about-pivotal/press-center/08262013-VMware>.
